Key Match Events: Garry Rodrigues scored a dramatic stoppage-time winner
Alexander Djiku headed home from Jordan Ayew's corner
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the third match of the day in Abidjan
Cape Verde went ahead in the 17th minute
Ghana equalised 11 minutes into the second half
Others: The match was played in Abidjan
The match was part of the Africa Cup of Nations finals
The match was between Ghana and Cape Verde
